description:
The punk professor Vivien Goldman presents an exclusive 4-part series exploring the elements: Earth, Water, Fire & Air. 
"Hear how artists across continents and decades have tuned into the elements to express their feelings, and what the Elements mean to us all. We need them more than they need us! Special thanks to The Incredible String Band for the theme tune, and Felix for its dub mix."
title: Vivien Goldman's Elements
